about_the_game:
Expand your The Surge 2 experience with the Future Shock Weapon Pack and get access to 4 new devastating weapons from the shadiest corners of Jericho City. The quarantine has sparked a surge in black market activities that unearthed previously secret projects. Find them as you fight your way through Jericho City, cut them from your enemies and equip them for yourself!

This pack includes :
  • The “Golden Twin Blades” Twin Rigged weapon
  • The “Mangled Articulators” Punching Gloves
  • The “Golden Harvest” Double Duty weapon
  • The “EFH” Heavy Duty Weapon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX-8320 (3.5 GHz) / Intel i5-4690K (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, AMD Radeon R9 280 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a graphics card compatible with Vulkan, requires Internet connection for online features.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX-8370 (4.0 GHz) / Intel Core i7-3820 (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB, AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
